timeline.bodyText: suggestion: Feels like this whole method would be better being somewhere outside of LogicalPlanner.
timeline.author: big-andy-coates

replies.bodyText: I figured it would be easier to refactor it (cf your comment #5023 (review)) if everything was in one place, but if you want I can split this one out now
replies.author: agavra

timeline.bodyText: This feels wrong - can we now rely on polymorphism here? i,.e. can we not simply call the source nodes and have then do the right thing, rather than having these instanceof conditionals?
timeline.author: big-andy-coates

replies.bodyText:
What I want to achieve is very specific to nested Join nodes. That means I have three ways I see to solve this:

use instanceof and just flatten the sources here (existing solution)
add a new method getLeafSources (seems like overkill)
change getSources() to recurse (I tried this and it didn't work out of the box, so it requires more changes)

I think the third option makes the most sense, I'll do that in a follow-up PR since it wasn't a one-shot change.
replies.author: agavra

replies.bodyText: EDIT: getSources() shouldn't recurse because it should give you exactly this node's sources. so it's between adding a new method and keeping it as is. I think I like it as is, but let me know if you feel strongly
replies.author: agavra

replies.bodyText: Don't feel strongly about it - just feels wrong. Without bringing the code down and trying out your changes I don't know a better way - so happy to merge.
replies.author: big-andy-coates
